short_description: image and content is a public relations agency based in glarus nord, switzerland.
long_description: image and content visual specializes in creating cutting-edge visual stories with moving images and/or photography at the intersection between culture, art, and brands. image and content pr provides communication and pr consultancy working across the architecture, design, and lifestyle sectors. working out of an inspiring 110-year-old artist studio located above the walensee one hour outside zurich and an office in the city, we collaborate with a roster of the best artistic, creative, and communications talent all over the world.

main_address_raw_text: haus surava, kerenzerbergstrasse 4, ch-8757 filzbach/gl, switzerland
short_description: image and content is a public relations agency based in albula/alvra, switzerland.
long_description: image and content specializes in creating captivating stories with moving images and/or photography at the intersection of culture, art and current affairs. we also offer bespoke ideas and concepts in pr and corporate communications. we look back at over 30 years of experience from the u.s. and europe in turning ideas into compelling and impactful narratives through films, documentaries, tv content, motion graphics, photography - in exhibitions, tv and cinema, books or virtual spaces. our pr + content department develops public relations and corporate communications strategies for brands, services and institutions, managing the integration of the client in its social and public environment, focusing on image and reputation. calling an inspiring artist studio built in 1911 located above the walensee - one hour outside of zurich - our base, we collaborate with a network of highly skilled and creative minds in arts, culture, cinema, design, architecture and technology across the globe.
